website_summaries.verdict: A masterstroke of open-world game design, Forza Horizon 3 is the premier arcade-style racing game on PC. Even the finicky offline mode and occasional frame-rate drop can't dull its shine.
pros: Hundreds of cars, both classic and new
Cross-platform play with Xbox One gamers
Near-seamless transition between solo and multiplayer modes

customer_reviews.title: Game stopped working after Windows 10 Creators Update.
customer_reviews.text: This game would have been worth five stars if it didnt have major performance issues on PC. This game would be worth 3 stars before the Windows 10 Creators update. At this stage is worth zero stars because after the update it simply does not work, it's been more than two months now, so it's safe to say Playground Games and Microsoft would not bother to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: pencil name

customer_reviews.title: Good game but wouldn't run on my PC
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't work on my PC unfortunately. Sticks on loading splash screen. A common problem after much research. The community suspicion is that the very latest major update stopped it working for many people. Refund given though by Amazon which is good. My brother has the game on XBox and it is good, I was hoping to cross-play with him...never mind.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Great soundtrack and custom radio stations via Onedrive a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Fanastic racing game, leaning more on the arcade style than simulator. Expands on the previous 2 Horizon games without ever really feeling repetitive. Gameplay is slick and smooth, and the game looks absolutely gorgeous. Great soundtrack and custom radio stations via Onedrive a nice feature, if a little buggy.
customer_reviews.author: mawksee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing! I have been a Forza fan since Motorsport 3 and I think this game is a great addition to the Horizon series. I was blown away with the enormous map and the graphics are astonishing. There is no better open world driving game than Forza Horizon 3.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect game!
customer_reviews.text: Great game, fun for hours. Great replayability and online functionality. Graphics are great, music is great and the cars are great!

customer_reviews.title: A must play game
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding game one of the best car games I’ve ever played with so much to do. It will keep you having fun for months.

customer_reviews.title: Best racing game out there at the moment
customer_reviews.text: Best racing game out there at the moment. Gave me the same sense of fun / playability that Gran Turismo originally gave me on the PS1! Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Best Racing Game Ever regardless of platform.
customer_reviews.text: The best racing game ever and I've played quite a few now that I'm over 50. Takes a bit getting used to having played Forza Horizon 2. Lots of jungle and sandy areas to drive so make sure you get the 4x4's for those surfaces. I mainly play on line. The only design flaw of the tracks is that it makes it easy for bad driving on-line players to get a really fast car without any grip and smash into you on the corners and make you miss going through the check points.
customer_reviews.author: RajeevX

customer_reviews.title: Forza!
customer_reviews.text: I would have enjoyed this more if I had more friends that play it or the people I find online were a little older, less close minded to folks with speech issues. The game itself in singleplayer is fulfilling as it has the physics that we expect from a Forza racing sim with the outrageous action we expect of a Horizon game and all the tuning options you're used to and desire from a Forza game.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Charlesworth

customer_reviews.title: It's a 3 star review because after purchase the download ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a 3 star review because after purchase the download link provided by Amazon wants to take you to your Xbox account if you have one. I hadn't realised that the PC download will only appear in the Windows store app. under the 'Start' button. The PC download link will appear here. Other than that I'm sure the game will live up to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Windows 10!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get this working on Xbox One. BUT cannot get the game to install or download for Windows 10 in the UK. All the specs are correct but when I click in the game library to install it only installs on the Xbox One. Microsoft have made a big deal about the digital version being cross platform for no extra charge but it doesn't seem to be working on this version at the present time. I hope that this can be resolved very soon, but please don't buy this yet if you want to install on a Windows 10 PC in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Marshall

customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS FOR PC UNLESS YOU ARE SURE!!!! My PC has windows 10. It says that is all i nee to run the game, but oh no. You can only buy this game if you have a real gaming PC. Not enough info is given in the description. You need a £150 graphics card and bags of memory. I'm not happy that this was not stated.

customer_reviews.title: Great game with real depth of gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Great game with real depth of gameplay. You can pick and choose your events as you navigate round the game whilst opening and expanding your festivals. Amazing graphics and just tonnes of stuff to do - hours of fun.

product_meta.title: Forza Horizon 3 Standard Edition [Xbox One/Windows 10 PC - Download Code]
product_meta.description:
THIS IS YOUR HORIZON You’re in charge of the Horizon Festival. Customize everything, hire and fire your friends, and explore Australia in over 350 of the world’s greatest cars. Make your Horizon the ultimate celebration of cars, music, and freedom of the open road. How you get there is up to you. EXPLORE AUSTRALIA, HORIZON’S LARGEST WORLD EVER Drive through the vast desert and rocky canyons of the Outback to lush, wild rainforests, and to the sandy beaches and gleaming skyscrapers of Australia's Gold Coast. CHOOSE FROM OVER 350 OF THE WORLD’S GREATEST CARS Every car is recreated with ForzaVista™ detail including full cockpit views, working lights and wipers, and new vehicle types bringing all-new driving experiences never before seen in Forza. DISCOVER THRILLING NEW DRIVING GAMEPLAY Danger Sign Jumps, Convoys, and Drift Zones are just some of the exciting new driving challenges that await you. Star in Thrilling Showcase events that pit you and your car against a fleet of powerboats, even a giant zeppelin! HIRE AND FIRE FRIENDS You’re the boss. Hire your friends’ Drivatars to help you gain fans and expand your festival, and form Convoys with them to explore the world even when they’re not online. If they’re not winning you fans, fire them! CUSTOMIZE EVERYTHING Horizon Blueprint gives you the power to modify every aspect of race events, championships, and Bucket List challenges – and instantly challenge friends to beat you at your own game. Choose your driver character, create custom paint jobs and vanity license plates, add new body kits – even select your own car horn sound. DRIVE TO THE MUSIC YOU LOVE Choose from eight diverse radio stations, or create a custom station from your own music collection. START AN ONLINE DRIVING ADVENTURE Online 4-Player Co-op allows you and your friends to experience the variety, competition, and rewards of a Horizon campaign together for the first time. PLAY THE AUCTION HOUSE Find rare cars and incredible works of art by the most talented creators in the Forza Community. 

System Requirements:  * Supported OS: Microsoft xBox One, Windows 10

Explore Australia, the Horizon Festival’s largest, most beautiful and diverse open world ever
Xbox One and Windows 10 PC exclusive. Supports Xbox Play Anywhere: yours to play on both Xbox One and Windows 10 PC at no additional cost
